thread.title: Win a seven-night Nile cruise
thread.title_full: Win a seven-night Nile cruise - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Win a seven-night Nile cruise
text: As the longest and one of the most important rivers in the world, the river Nile has helped support the lives of Egyptians for thousands of years. The magical river runs through some of the most amazing sights in Egypt and the rest of Africa. Now, you have the opportunity to win a seven-night cruise along the famous river to experience its beauty for yourself. The fantastic prize includes: • International flights • Seven nights accommodation for two on board a Sanctuary boat on a full board basis • All sightseeing, guiding and entrance fees as per itinerary For the chance to win this amazing holiday to Egypt, simply complete the form below by midnight on 31 December 2015 Online Form - Win a seven-night Nile cruise
